The challenges our state faces are many & great, but I believe we‚Äôre up to the task. I look forward to fighting alongside the Nevada Legislature, @GovSisolak & our constitutional officers to do right by Nevadans. Because when Nevadans have a fair shot at success, Nevada thrives.

If working families in Nevada are to have a fair shot, we must address the lack of affordable housing. Affordable housing is key to providing stability and economic security for Nevada families, allowing them to build wealth and plan for the future.

I recognize that rapid economic growth comes with growing pains for our state. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre working together to find innovative solutions to one of Nevada‚Äôs greatest challenges: ensuring hardworking families in our state can afford to live in their communities.

I‚Äôve developed legislation & fought for opportunities that encourage the development of smart tech, expand access to broadband in underserved communities, and put guardrails in place to protect workers & ensure the responsible use of tech that continues to diversify our economy.

Nevada is a leader in innovation. In the Senate, I‚Äôve introduced legislation that ensures we continue to see strong economic development and job creation for Nevadans. My agenda is based on what I‚Äôve seen right here in Nevada. I call it the Innovation State Initiative.

We‚Äôre working across all levels of gov't to address the root cause of natural disasters: climate change. Whether it‚Äôs strengthening partnerships to protect Tahoe or advancing renewable energy, we'll continue to prioritize conservation while creating good-paying jobs for Nevadans.

A healthy NV also means protecting our environment. There‚Äôs no better example of our collaboration than our unified response to the Admin‚Äôs decision to ship plutonium to the state. And when it comes to Yucca Mountain, we‚Äôll continue working together to make sure it stays dead.

I‚Äôm committed to continuing to fight by your side to improve the Affordable Care Act and expand the number of health care options available to patients and families, especially in Nevada‚Äôs rural communities.

It‚Äôs our partnerships that can strengthen our state, keep us moving forward, and allow us to address the issues that matter most to Nevadans. We can build a healthier Nevada with greater opportunities for everyone. And it starts by listening.

I‚Äôm proud to represent the first state with a female-majority legislature & Supreme Court; & one of just a handful of states to be represented by two women in the U.S. Senate. We understand that our diversity is our strength. We understand that we all win when we work together.
